TEI.2.document_title: Hansen Allsbury to Stephen F Austin, 12-29-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Hansen Allsbury to Austin, Augusta, Me., December 29, 1832. Asking Austin's intervention in assisting his mother.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 911
